Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: CONCLUSION : Only one hypersensitivity reaction to CE was documented among 9 P and N - highly NSAIDs intolerant patients .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph:

1. CE: This stands for "celecoxib", which is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain and inflammation.
2. P: This stands for "patients".
3. N: This stands for "nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug".
4. NSAIDs: This stands for "nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs", which is a class of drugs that includes CE (celecoxib) and other medications like ibuprofen and aspirin.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
